title: PPC Game Pack for lazy ppl
description:
This gamepack must be copied directly to storage card/prognoins, after that run gameregs.cab and use ONLY the links on the links folder.

The idea about this pack is that you dont need a pc at all to use the games...nor you need to install em...or reg them...

A list of the games:
Zuma
Treasure Island
Worms World Party
Wild Gears
Westward
Warring Nations
Warlords 2
Warfare Inc
Undercroft
Tradewinds 2
Tower Mogul
Titanic
Through Enemy Eyes
The Quest
Space Trader
Simcity 2000
Shift
S-Tris
Robo
Revival
Rayman Ultimate
Pocket 4000
Pocket UFO
Pocket Humanity
Palm Heroes
Orions Legend of Wizards
Orions Second Age
Nethack
Nanobotz
Legend of Seel
Legacy
High Seas
Hexic
Gamebox Asia
Flux Challenge
Fade
Enslave
Bust`em 2
Brutal Wars
Bejeweled 2
Azgard Defemce
Arvale
Arvale Short Tales
Arvale 2 - Ocen Of Time
Argentum
Ancient Evil


And on the big pack there is:
Syberia 2
Return To Mysterious Island
